DOC.brief_summary: The goal study collect preliminary data efficacy intervention enhance recovery hospitalization community dwell old adult .
DOC.brief_title: Muscle Anabolic Interventions Accelerate Recovery From Hospitalization Geriatric Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study test efficacy intervention enhance recovery hospitalization community dwell old adult .
DOC.criteria: Admitted UTMB hospital Aged 65 year older Selfreported ability ( without aid assistive device ) walk across small room two week prior hospitalization Alert orient x3 physician H & P . Discharged `` home '' hospital discharge . Participation study terminate subject discharge home hospital stay . A Nursing home resident hospice care patient Uncontrolled blood pressure ( systolic > 170 , diastolic > 100 ) New onset motor disability prevents walk time baseline test ( stroke motor disability , low limb orthopedic dx ) End stage renal disease AST/ALT 2.5 time normal limit Recent ( within 3 month ) current treatment anabolic steroid . History breast prostate cancer Palpable prostate nodule induration prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) ≥ 4 ng/ml ( PSA ≥ 3 ng/ml men high risk prostate cancer ) Hematocrit ≥ 50 % Any condition event consider exclusionary PI faculty physician
